trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Représente un workflow exécutant des activités de façon séquentielle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> est une <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> avec les événements `Initialized` et `Completed` pour le traitement facultatif de paramètres.

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: Cela la rend particulièrement utile en tant qu'activité de niveau supérieur lorsque vous concevez des workflows de style séquentiel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> est un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, ce qui signifie que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> peut contenir d'autres activités.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nom de l'activité défini par l'utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> à l'aide du nom de l'activité.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow has finished.
trans-unit.target: Se produit lorsque le workflow est terminé.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> class, and set the event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: L'exemple de code suivant illustre la création d'une nouvelle classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> et définit le gestionnaire de l'événement <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Policy SDK Sample from the DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Cet exemple de code fait partie de l'exemple du Kit de développement logiciel Policy (SDK) qui provient du fichier DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Advanced Policy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez [avancé de stratégie](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Représente le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> qui cible l'événement <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit une <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> dans laquelle des mises à jour dynamiques peuvent être effectuées dans le workflow, en cas de substitution dans une classe dérivée.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> identifiant si les mises à jour dynamiques peuvent être faites.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associé au <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Runs the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Exécute le workflow.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> at the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> pour <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> à la fin de l'opération requise.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Se produit lorsque le workflow est initialisé.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Représente le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> qui cible l'événement <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associé au <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Déclenche le <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> de la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" /> est une référence Null (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).
